Raynor.name: Penetrating Round
Raynor.description: Deals 240 (+4% per level) damage and knocks enemies back.

Raynor.name: Inspire
Raynor.description: Gain 30% bonus Attack Speed for 6 seconds. Nearby allies gain half of the bonus.

Raynor.name: Adrenaline Rush
Raynor.description: Automatically activates to heal for 440 (+4% per level) when you are below 30% Health.

Raynor.name: Hyperion
Raynor.description: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage a second, hitting up to 4 enemies. Also occasionally fires its Yamato Cannon on Structures for 794 (+4% per level) damage. Lasts 12 seconds.

Raynor.name: Raynor's Raiders
Raynor.description: Summon two Stealthed Banshees that attack an enemy. Each Banshee deals 67.5 (+4% per level) damage a second and lasts 22 seconds. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Banshees.

Raynor.name: Advanced Optics
Raynor.description: Basic Attack range is 20% further than other ranged Heroes, and you see 10% further than other Heroes.

1.name: Scouting Drone
1.description: Places a Scouting Drone at target location, granting vision and revealing a large area around it for 45 seconds. This drone cannot be hidden and is killed by enemies with 2 Basic Attacks.  Stores up to 2 charges.

1.name: Seasoned Marksman
1.description: Quest: Every Minion killed near you grants 0.2 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0.5 Attack Damage.  Reward: Upon gaining 40 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 40% for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

4.name: Confident Aim
4.description: Lowers the cooldown of Penetrating Round by 4 seconds if it hits an enemy Hero.

4.name: Focused Attack
4.description: Every 10 seconds, your next Basic Attack against a Hero deals 60% additional damage. Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second.

4.name: Relentless Leader
4.description: Once every 8 seconds, if you are Stunned or Rooted you knock nearby enemies away and reduce the cooldown of Adrenaline Rush by 15 seconds.

4.name: Vigorous Assault
4.description: Basic Attacks heal for 15% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

7.name: Fight or Flight
7.description: Whenever Adrenaline Rush activates, it gives 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25% for 4 seconds.  Adrenaline Rush can also be manually activated.

7.name: Hamstring Shot
7.description: Enemies hit by Penetrating Round have a 20% Movement Speed slow for 3 seconds.

7.name: Puttin' On a Clinic
7.description: Whenever an enemy Minion you have recently damaged is destroyed, your Ability cooldowns are reduced by 1.5 seconds.

7.name: Revolution Overdrive
7.description: Gain 10% Movement Speed while affected by Inspire.  Increase this bonus by 5% for each allied Hero nearby when Inspire is cast.

10.name: Hyperion
10.description: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run dealing 66 (+4% per level) damage a second, hitting up to 4 enemies. Also occasionally fires its Yamato Cannon on Structures for 794 (+4% per level) damage. Lasts 12 seconds.

10.name: Raynor's Raiders
10.description: Summon two Stealthed Banshees that attack an enemy. Each Banshee deals 78 (+4% per level) damage a second and lasts 22 seconds. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Banshees.

13.name: Double-Barreled
13.description: Penetrating Round gains a second charge.

13.name: Giant Killer
13.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

13.name: Steel Resolve
13.description: Increases Inspire's duration by 50% and causes Adrenaline Rush to also apply Inspire.

16.name: Bullseye
16.description: The first enemy hit by Penetrating Round is stunned for 1 second.

16.name: Cluster Round
16.description: Penetrating Round damage is increased by 20% for each additional target hit up to 100%, and the width is increased by 50%.

16.name: Executioner
16.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

20.name: A Card to Play
20.description: Whenever a Hero (ally or enemy) is killed, the cooldown of your Heroic Ability is reduced by 15 seconds.

20.name: Dusk Wings
20.description: Banshees remain Stealthed while attacking and fire 50% more frequently.

20.name: Nexus Frenzy
20.description: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Attack Range by 1.1.

20.name: Scorched Earth
20.description: An additional set of lasers blast the ground 5 times per second, dealing 40 (+4% per level) damage in an area.
